SectionContent.text: “The religions in my portfolio weren't useless after all. None of them were. They weren't all true. But they all had truth. ”—Sazed
Sazed is a Terrisman steward from Scadrial.[3] He is part of Kelsier's crew. He is a Keeper, considered something of a rebel by the others of his kind. He is the current Vessel of the Shard Harmony.

SectionContent.Title: Titles
SectionContent.Text: Hero of Ages, Rabzeen, The Anamnesor, Master Vaht, Holy First Witness, The Announcer, Chief Ambassador of the New Empire, Harmony, God
